sentences.english: When there are contradictions between clients and mottled bamboo, I think it's wrong customers.
sentences.chinese: 客戶和斑竹發生矛盾，我認爲是客戶錯了。

sentences.english: Seems the moderators have gone to extremes now.
sentences.chinese: 似乎斑竹們現在都變得極端了。

sentences.english: Owner to retain the ultimate power of interpretation.
Sounds interesting. Did you see the moderator?
sentences.chinese: 聽上去不錯。你見到“斑竹”了嗎？

sentences.english: I think that the webmaster makes out already very good.
sentences.chinese: 竊以爲斑竹已經盡心盡力了。

sentences.english: Later, I was the "mottled bamboo", who can manage the things in the iciba.
sentences.chinese: 後來，我成了斑竹，可以幫他一起管理了。

sentences.english: Yeah I still play the organ, but not the service, just for myself.
sentences.chinese: 她就是天涯《閒閒書話》裏的管風琴斑竹。

sentences.english: Trouble, who knows a friend or up to the next owner to answer.
sentences.chinese: 麻煩了知道的朋友或者達人斑竹解答下。

definition: same as 斑竹[ban1 zhu2], mottled bamboo, since according to legend the spots on mottled bamboo are marks left by the tears shed by two of King Shun's 舜[Shun4] concubines (Ehuang 娥皇[E2 huanɡ2] and Nüying 女英[Nü3 yinɡ1], known as the Concubines of the Xiang 湘妃[Xiang1 Fei1]) upon learning of his death
Furong district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan/Seremban, capital of Sembilan state 森美蘭|森美兰[Sen1 mei3 lan2], Malaysia
hibiscus/cotton rose (Hibiscus mutabilis)/lotus/foo yung (Chinese dish similar to an omelet)
Phoebe zhennan/Machilus nanmu/Chinese cedar/Chinese giant redwood
other name of the Xiangjiang river 湘江[Xiang1 jiang1] in Hunan province
